title: How to study CN units 3 and 4?

comments.body: If you have got time try to go through the textbook, else this series might help https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL1ya5dD_M8uX-BLUF1FEvUNsYWQL5_l0O&si=MVLoHUM4j5lN_9Ea
oh hell nah I didn't join CSE to study all this ðŸ’€
It's one of the most important subjects in CS and is also needed for placements. No way out
CS is not programming. It never was.
im disappointed I didnt know this earlier
CS is about solving problems using machines. Programming is just one of the many means to implement a solution. The real CS is theoretical CS.

ah well I have studied some networking in 12th grade and I can say that I hated it...
